TableConfigs.name: Users
TableConfigs.createCommand: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS 'Users' (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,Name TEXT UNIQUE NOT NULL,Email TEXT, PhoneNumber TEXT, Rfid TEXT UNIQUE, Type NUMBER, HashedPassword TEXT NOT NULL)
TableConfigs.addCommand: INSERT INTO 'Users' (Name, Email, PhoneNumber, Type) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?)
